metaTags.metaDescription: Welcome to the Cloudflare Security Week hub. See our Security Week announcements, product launches, and Cloudflare TV events all in one place.

relatedBlades.title: Security Week 2022
relatedBlades.copy:
Dive into security week to learn how we'll accelerate zero trust, 
sharpen application security, strengthen network security and more.

features.title: Welcome to Security Week
features.description: Welcome to our first innovation week of the year: Security Week! In this post we will be going over Cloudflare's security products' history giving you an introduction to all the great announcements we have planned.

features.title: Democratizing email security: protecting individuals and businesses of all sizes from phishing and malware attacks
features.description: Once the acquisition of Area 1 closes, we plan to give all paid self-serve plans access to their email security technology at no additional charge

features.title: Investigating threats using the Cloudflare Security Center
features.description: The data we glean from attacks trains our machine learning models and improves the efficacy of our network and application security products, but historically hasn't been available to query directly. This week, we're changing that

imageAssetFile.altText: Security Week 22 - Investigating threats using the Cloudflare Security Center
imageAssetFile.title: Security Week 22 - Investigating threats using the Cloudflare Security Center

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a magnifying glass inspecting a light bulb

features.title: WAF for everyone: protecting the web from high severity vulnerabilities
features.description: We are excited to provide our new Cloudflare Web Application Firewall, with a Free Managed Ruleset to all Cloudflare users

features.title: Announcing the Cloudflare API Gateway
features.description: Today we're announcing the Cloudflare API Gateway. We're going to completely replace your existing gateway at a fraction of the cost

features.title: Cloudflare and CrowdStrike partner to give CISOs secure control across devices, applications, and corporate networks
features.description: We're very excited to announce multiple new integrations with CrowdStrike. These integrations combine the power of Cloudflare's expansive network and Zero Trust suite, with CrowdStrike's Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) and incident remediation offerings

features.title: Managing Clouds - Cloudflare CASB and our not so secret plan for what's next
features.description: Right now we're working on making the out-of-band CASB product a seamless part of the Zero Trust platform

features.title: Cloudflare Observability
features.description: Being a single pane of glass for all network activity has always been one of Cloudflare's goals. Today, we're outlining the future vision for Cloudflare observability.

features.title: Application security: Cloudflare's view
features.description: In this post, we share some of the insights we've gathered from the 32 million HTTP requests/second that pass through our network

imageAssetFile.altText: A first look at Cloudflare's view on Application Security
imageAssetFile.title: A first look at Cloudflare's view on Application Security

features.title: Introducing: Backup Certificates
features.description: We are excited to introduce backup certificates to increase reliability of our service for anyone using the Cloudflare platform in the event of key compromises or related issues.

features.title: Get full observability into your Cloudflare logs with New Relic
features.description: Correlating Cloudflare logs across your stack in New Relic One is powerful for monitoring and debugging in order to keep services safe and reliable. We're excited to have partnered with New Relic to create a direct integration that provides this visibility.

imageAssetFile.altText: Get full observability into your Cloudflare logs with New Relic
imageAssetFile.title: Get full observability into your Cloudflare logs with New Relic

features.title: Leverage IBM QRadar SIEM to get insights from Cloudflare logs
features.description: We're excited to announce that Cloudflare customers are now able to push their logs directly to QRadar. This direct integration leads to cost savings and faster log delivery for Cloudflare and QRadar SIEM customers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Leverage IBM QRadar SIEM to get insights from Cloudflare logs
imageAssetFile.title: Leverage IBM QRadar SIEM to get insights from Cloudflare logs

features.title: A new WAF Experience
features.description: The security landscape is moving fast. We invited users to help us shape a new WAF experience that enables us to evolve WAF to meet their demands and use cases

imageAssetFile.altText: Security Week 22 - A new WAF Experience
imageAssetFile.title: Security Week 22 - A new WAF Experience

features.title: Security for SaaS Providers
features.description: Today, we're excited to give our SaaS providers new tools that will help them enhance the security of their customers' applications

imageAssetFile.altText: Security Week 22 - Security for SaaS Providers
imageAssetFile.title: Security Week 22 - Security for SaaS Providers

features.title: Improving the WAF with Machine Learning
features.description: Today we are excited to complement managed rulesets (such as OWASP and Cloudflare Managed) with a new tool aimed at identifying bypasses and malicious payloads without human involvement, and before they are exploited

imageAssetFile.altText: Security Week 22 - Improving the WAF with Machine Learning
imageAssetFile.title: Security Week 22 - Improving the WAF with Machine Learning

features.title: Cloudflare Zaraz supports CSP
features.description: If you have Cloudflare Zaraz enabled on your website, you don't have to ask yourself twice if you should enable CSP because there's no harmful collision between CSP & Cloudflare Zaraz.

imageAssetFile.altText: Security Week 22 - Cloudflare Zaraz supports CSP
imageAssetFile.title: Security Week 22 - Cloudflare Zaraz supports CSP

features.title: Introducing Advanced Rate Limiting
features.description: Advance Rate Limiting allows counting requests based on virtually any characteristics of the HTTP request, regardless of its source IP

features.title: Announcing Friendly Bots
features.description: Our customers can choose to allowlist any bot that is verified. Unfortunately, new bots are popping up faster than we can verify them. So today we're announcing a solution: Friendly Bots

features.title: Envoy Media: Using Cloudflare's Bot Management & ML
features.description: How Envoy Media uses Bot Score and Machine Learning to improve business outcomes

imageAssetFile.altText: Envoy Media: Using Cloudflare's Bot Management & ML
imageAssetFile.title: Envoy Media: Using Cloudflare's Bot Management & ML

features.title: Clientless Web Isolation is now generally available
features.description: Today, we're excited to announce that Clientless Web Isolation is generally available

imageAssetFile.altText: Clientless Web Isolation is now generally available
imageAssetFile.title: Clientless Web Isolation is now generally available

features.title: Evolving Machine Learning to stop mobile bots
features.description: How Cloudflare has evolved our Machine Learning models to identify automated traffic in mobile apps.

features.title: Protect All Network Traffic on Cloudflare
features.description: Today, we're extending the availability of Magic Transit to customers with smaller networks by offering Magic Transit-protected, Cloudflare-managed IP space

imageAssetFile.altText: Protect All Network Traffic on Cloudflare
imageAssetFile.title: Protect All Network Traffic on Cloudflare

features.title: Packet captures at the edge
features.description: Today, we're excited to announce the general availability of on-demand packet captures from Cloudflare's global network

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a laptop with security icons

features.title: Cloudflare and Aruba partner to deliver a seamless global secure network from the branch to the cloud
features.description: Today we are excited to announce that Cloudflare and Aruba are working together to develop a solution that will enable Aruba customers to connect EdgeConnect SD-WAN's with Cloudflare's global network to further secure their corporate traffic with Cloudflare One

features.title: A bridge to Zero Trust
features.description: Today, we're excited to announce the ability to route traffic from user devices with our lightweight roaming agent (WARP) installed to any network connected with our Magic IP-layer tunnels

features.title: Cloudflare partners with Microsoft to protect joint customers with a Global Zero Trust Network
features.description: As a company, we are constantly asking ourselves what we can do to provide more value to our customers, including integrated solutions with our partners.

imageAssetFile.altText: Protect Azure Apps with Cloudflare Zero Trust
imageAssetFile.title: Protect Azure Apps with Cloudflare Zero Trust

features.title: Introducing SSH command logging
features.description: We built SSH command logging into Cloudflare Zero Trust to provide SSH visibility at a network layer instead of relying on software on individual machines

features.title: Zero Trust client sessions
features.description: Starting today, you can build Zero Trust rules that require periodic authentication to control network access

features.title: Securing Cloudflare with Cloudflare
features.description: Cloudflare is committed to bolstering our security posture with best-in-class solutions — which is why we often turn to our own products as any other Cloudflare customer would.

features.title: Commitment to Customer Security
features.description: Cloudflare has been hooked on securing customers globally since its inception. Our services protect customer traffic and data as well as our own, and we are continuously improving and expanding those services to respond to the changing threat landscape of the Internet

features.title: Domain Scoped Roles - Early Access
features.description: Cloudflare is making it easier for enterprise account owners to manage their team's access to Cloudflare by allowing user access to be scoped to sets of domains

features.title: Using Cloudflare One to Secure IoT Devices
features.description: We asked ourselves: can we use our own products to secure IoT devices themselves — even on the same network as production systems? Using Cloudflare One, the answer is yes.

imageAssetFile.altText: Using Cloudflare One to Secure IoT Devices
imageAssetFile.title: Using Cloudflare One to Secure IoT Devices
